recipe_name: Crispy noodle cake with stir-fried beef
author: Paul Rankin
method: To make the crispy noodle cake, stir the soy sauce and sesame oil into the cooked noodles. Heat the vegetable oil in a small frying pan, add the noodles and cook for three minutes on each side. Remove with a slotted spoon and drain on kitchen paper. To make the stir-fried beef, heat the vegetable oil in a frying pan, add the spring onion and cook for two minutes. Add the garlic, chilli and ginger and cook for one minute. Add the beef and stir fry for 1-2 minutes. Stir in the sugar snap peas. To serve, pour the stir-fried beef onto the crispy noodle cake.
ingredients: 1 tbsp soy sauce,  2 tsp sesame oil,  125g/4½oz egg noodles, cooked and drained,  2 tsp vegetable oil,  1 tbsp vegetable oil,  1 spring onion, roughly chopped,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  ¼ red chilli, finely chopped,  pinch ground ginger,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  100g/3½oz sirloin beef, thinly sliced,  75g/2½oz sugar snap peas
